column4: A space for drawing and painting.
A space for sculpture or three-dimensional art work.
A space with built-in equipment for creating pottery.
A space with built-in equipment for printing and processing photographic films and papers.
A space with a built-in oven or furnace for pottery making.
A space with built-in equipment for producing images.
Other is specified as the space designed to support the teaching and learning of 2 dimensional or 3 dimensional visual arts.
